About AK Health & Safety Training

At AK Health & Safety Training, we are committed to providing world-class training and certifications in occupational health and safety. Our programs are designed to meet international standards and prepare professionals for safer workplaces across industries.

ðŸŽ¯ Our Mission

To create safer work environments by providing comprehensive health and safety education that empowers professionals with the knowledge and skills needed to protect themselves and others in any workplace setting.

ðŸš€ Our Vision

To be the leading provider of occupational health and safety training globally, recognized for our commitment to excellence, innovation in teaching methods, and measurable impact on workplace safety standards.

Our Certifications

NEBOSH

  • International General Certificate (IGC): Comprehensive foundation in health and safety management
  • Level 6 Diploma: Advanced qualification for health and safety professionals

IOSH

  • Managing Safely: Designed for managers and supervisors to effectively manage health and safety in their teams

OSHA

  • 30-hour Training: In-depth safety training for construction and general industry workers in the American context

OTHM

  • Level 6 Diploma in Occupational Health and Safety: Advanced qualification recognized internationally

Specialized Courses

  • Risk Assessment: Hazard identification and risk assessment
  • First Aid: Immediate incident response training
  • Fire Safety: Fire risk assessment and prevention
  • ISO Standards: Lead auditor courses for ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 45001
  • Industry-Specific Training: Construction safety, manual handling, electrical safety

Whether you are an individual seeking professional growth or an organization aiming to strengthen workplace safety, AK Health & Safety Training provides the knowledge and skills you need to succeed.
